title: PC February 18 - On 7 October of the Palestinian Resistance and on 7 October of the lies of Israel and Imperialism
content:
What happened on October 7th? Israeli soldier reveals the order to shoot against a Kibbutz

Of Wyatt Reed - Max Blumenthal *


New revelations are added to the growing body of tests that indicate that Many Israelis who died on 7 October were killed by the army Israeli. In the meantime, the Israeli government has put the bavaglio ai prisoners freed from Gaza to avoid damaging further The official narrative.

Testimonies of the first hand of Israeli soldiers, however inexperienced, reveal the order to open fire against Israeli communities when i Palestinian militiamen have violated the fences surrounding Gaza the October 7th.

A "exciting" service of a company of tanks all female, published by the Israeli network N12 News, contains admissions by the captain of the twenty year old - identified only as "Karni" - who was ordered by a soldier "in panic" of open fire on the homes of the Kibbutz holit, regardless of the fact that contained civilians or not.

Ten Israelis were killed in Holit on October 7th; There were no children among the dead.

“ The soldier pointed to me and said to me: “Shoot there - the terrorists are there ”, said the captain in the video just published, stressing that when he asked "Are there civilians there?", His compatriot simply replied "I don't know" and ordered them to "Shoot" however a tank shot against the buildings.

At the end, he recalled, "I decided not to shoot" because "this is one Israeli Community ". Instead, he added, “I shot with mine machine gun against a house ”.

While the Israeli government and its army of international propagandists They only blamed Hamas for a series of macabre killings on 7 October, together with unfounded statements of rapes, torture e beheadings of children, the comments in the N12 report are added to a growing body of tests that show that the bombings of Israeli tanks are responsible for many of the victims suffered in Israeli Kibbutzim. According to the soldiers interviewed, among others killed by the company of tanks in question are alleged Palestinian militiamen to whom they say they have crushed them to death the their vehicle.

“ The my driver sees two terrorists on the road and reports it, "says the Captain to his interviewer N12. When “I tell her to invest them, she He limits himself to investing terrorists and passes further, "he explains happily.

There Female Carristi Company seems to have been trained on less advanced vehicles than the Israeli Arsenale and have been entrusted to you Only borders' defense tasks. In the chaos of the Hamas assault of 7 October, they were forced to climb more advanced vehicles, equipped of a remote control weapon system (RCWs).

In the Report of the N12, Brigadier General Raviv Mahmia admitted that face a gang of militiamen in the Kibbutz Holit was a task "Very complex" for which the young Carriste “in many ways ... not they were trained to fight. "

“ They shot in Israeli communities, guiding on normal roads, "he observed.

Getting the Israeli prisoners liberated to save the narrative

The revelations that Israeli troops received the order to open the fire indiscriminately on the communities Israeli arrive while the country's security services perform Desperate efforts to control the narrative of the Gaza war.

TO followed by an agreement of ceased the temporary fire it saw Dozens of Jewish prisoners released by Gaza starting from 24 November, Israel channel 12 revealed that the authorities of Tel Aviv have established new rules that require that the Israelis freed they are strictly monitored when they give interviews.

THE prisoners freed from Hamas' custody “will have to receive one close supervision and will be educated on what to say to the media and what No ”, clarified the report.

To the moment of publication, none of the freed Israelis of Recent he had publicly spoke with the media. The apparitions of prisoners in the Israeli media have become increasingly rare after the Release of Yochaved Lifshitz, 85 years old, which was harshly criticized for having tightened his hand to one of his custodians in Hamas and having recognized that "they treated us with kindness".

THE Recent comments from a relative of another elderly Israeli woman Released on November 24, Ruth Munder seem to validate this Thesis.

Describe The period spent by the Israelis in Gaza, the family member said: “Fortunately, they have not lived unpleasant experiences during theirs imprisonment; they were treated in a human way ".

THE Recent comments from a relative of another elderly Israeli woman Released on November 24, Ruth Munder seem to validate this Thesis.

Describe The period spent by the Israelis in Gaza, the family member has declared: “Fortunately, they have not lived unpleasant experiences during their captivity; they were treated in a human way ".

“ Contrary to our fears ”, Munder“ did not meet the horrible stories that We had imagined "and, in the end, the custodians of the prisoners“ do not have made to them of evil, "said the family member to the newspaper Israeli Jerusalem Post.

At the same way, the sister of a Thai worker taken hostage a Gaza told the international media that his brother was "Treated very well" and "seemed happy" when it was released.

A Guest of the Israeli Channel Channel 13 News recognized that “it is It is important to remember that many have accused [the former prisoner Israeli] Yochaved Lifschitz [of unfair], but she said Just these things. He suffered bad treatment and was described as the cause of significant media damage, accused of lie because of the prison of her husband, that Hamas influenced her, making it the washing of the brain before its release. But each Word he said was true, and these people do the same statements ".

To the time to leave Gaza for Israel, the Israeli prisoner Danielle Aloni left a letter to his Hamas jailers thanking them for "the unparalleled sense of humanity you have shown to me and my daughter Emilia. You were like parents for her, inviting her to your room every time you he wanted. "

Has concluded expressing gratitude for "the kind act you have shown here despite the difficult situation you were facing you themselves. And for the difficult losses they hit you here in Gaza. I wish that in this world we could be friends. "

During The prison period, Aloni appeared in a video in which he foiled Netanyahu for his inability to negotiate his release and that of the other hostages.

While The Israeli government can argue that Aloni was forced to Writing the letter under extreme constraint, has not yet allowed them to speak publicly about his experience in Gaza.

* The GrayZone
